meta.workflow_packages.blank.label: Blank Canvas
meta.workflow_packages.iterative_loop.de: Cycle AI planning, tool execution, and feedback until no tool calls remain.
meta.workflow_packages.single_pass.label: Single Pass
meta.workflow_packages.single_pass.descr: Run one AI request and tool execution sequence without looping.
meta.workflow_packages.plan_execute_summ: Plan with the model, run tools, then ask for a final recap.
Run lint, unit, then UI tests with conditional gating.
meta.workflow_packages.repo_scan_context: Map-reduce repo files into context before the AI request.
meta.workflow_packages.contextual_iterat: Scan files into context, then loop AI/tool steps until no tool calls remain.
meta.workflow_packages.game_tick_loop.de: Seed a tick script and loop AI/tool steps for a few cycles.
meta.workflow_packages.logic_plugins_tes: Unit tests for logic workflow plugins (and, or, equals, gt, lt, etc.).
meta.workflow_packages.math_plugins_test: Unit tests for math workflow plugins (add, multiply, subtract, divide, min, max, etc.).
meta.workflow_packages.string_plugins_te: Unit tests for string workflow plugins (concat, upper, lower, split, length, etc.).
meta.workflow_packages.list_plugins_test: Unit tests for list workflow plugins (concat, length, slice, find, etc.).
meta.workflow_packages.dict_plugins_test: Unit tests for dict workflow plugins (get, set, keys, merge, etc.).
